}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== DW1703 / DW 1703
This device appears to be used in the.. *Dell [http://www.dell.com/support/drivers/us/en/19/DriverDetails/Product/xps-8500?driverId=MMX1J&fileId=2952379602 XPS Desktop 8500] ([http://forums.opensuse.org/deutsch-german/hilfe-und-helfen/hardware/478134-welche-pci-express-grafikkarte-funktioniert-mit-opensuse-12-2-ohne-probleme.html lspci]) *Dell [http://www.dell.com/support/drivers/us/en/19/DriverDetails/Product/xps-8500?driverId=MMX1J&fileId=2952379602 Vostro Desktop 470]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
